category.text: $course$/1081_405899001_基礎程式設計的預設/進階條件判斷

questiontext.text:
撰寫並修正教科書第15章的CAPSTONE專案程式，完成文字冒險旅程遊戲：
一開始顯示下列文字說明
"""You are on a deserted island in a 2D world.
Try to survive until rescue arrives!
Available commands are in CAPITAL letters.
Any other command exits the program

First LOOK around..."""

1.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。
使用者若輸入 "LOOK" ，顯示下列文字後進行第2步
"""You are stuck in a sand ditch.

Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT."""

否則顯示下列文字並離開程式
"""You can only do actions shown in capital letters.

Try again!"""

2.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。
使用者若輸入 "LEFT" ，顯示下列文字後進行第3步

"""You see a STARFISH and a CRAB on the sand.
And you're hungry! Which do you eat?"""

若輸入 "RIGHT" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式
"""No can do. That side is very slippery.
You fall very far into some weird cavern.

You do not survive :("""

否則顯示下列文字並離開程式
"""You can only do actions shown in capital letters.

Try again!"""

3.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。
使用者若輸入 "STARFISH" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式
"""Oh no! You immediately don't feel well.

You do not survive :("""

若輸入 "CRAB" ，顯示下列文字後進行第4步
"Raw crab should be fine, right? YES or NO."
否則顯示下列文字並離開程式
"""You can only do actions shown in capital letters.

Try again!"""

4.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。
使用者若輸入 "YES" ，顯示下列文字後進行第5步
"""Ok, You eat it raw. Fingers crossed.

Food in your belly helps you see a TREE."""

若輸入 "NO" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式
"""Well, there's nothing else left to eat.

You do not survive :("""

否則顯示下列文字並離開程式
"""You can only do actions shown in capital letters.

Try again!"""

5.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。
使用者若輸入 "TREE" ，顯示下列文字後進行第6步
"""It's a coconut tree! And you're thirsty!

Do you drink the coconut water? YES or NO."""

否則顯示下列文字並離開程式
"""You can only do actions shown in capital letters.

Try again!"""

6.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。
使用者若輸入 "YES" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式
"""Oh boy. Coconut water and rawcrab don't mix.

You do not survive :("""

若輸入 "NO" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式
"""Good choice.

Look! It's a rescue plane! You made it! \o/"""

否則顯示下列文字並離開程式
"""You can only do actions shown in capital letters.

Try again!"""

如： 按順序輸入 "LOOK" 、"LEFT"、"CRAB"、"YES"、"TREE"、"NO" ，可得最後結果為
"""Good choice.

Look! It's a rescue plane! You made it! \o/"""

question.answer:
banner="""You are on a deserted island in a 2D world. Try to survive until rescue arrives! Available commands are in CAPITAL letters. Any other command exits the program First LOOK around..."""
prompt=":: "
look_info1="""You are stuck in a sand ditch. Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT.""" else_info="""You can only do actions shown in capital letters. Try again!"""
left_info2="""You see a STARFISH and a CRAB on the sand. And you're hungry! Which do you eat?""" right_info2="""No can do. That side is very slippery. You fall very far into some weird cavern. You do not survive :("""
starfish_info3="""Oh no! You immediately don't feel well. You do not survive :(""" crab_info3="Raw crab should be fine, right? YES or NO."
yes_info4="""Ok, You eat it raw. Fingers crossed. Food in your belly helps you see a TREE.""" no_info4="""Well, there's nothing else left to eat. You do not survive :("""
tree_info5="""It's a coconut tree! And you're thirsty! Do you drink the coconut water? YES or NO."""
yes_info6="""Oh boy. Coconut water and rawcrab don't mix. You do not survive :(""" no_info6="""Good choice. Look! It's a rescue plane! You made it! \o/"""
print(banner) ans=input(prompt) #1.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。 if ans=="LOOK": #使用者若輸入 "LOOK" ，顯示下列文字後進行第2步 print(look_info1) ans=input(prompt) #2.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。 if ans=="LEFT" : #使用者若輸入 "LEFT" ，顯示下列文字後進行第3步 print(left_info2) ans=input(prompt) #3.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。 if ans=="STARFISH": #使用者若輸入 "STARFISH" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式 print(starfish_info3) elif ans=="CRAB": #若輸入 "CRAB" ，顯示下列文字後進行第4步 print(crab_info3) ans=input(prompt) #4.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。 if ans=="YES": #使用者若輸入 "YES" ，顯示下列文字後進行第5步 print(yes_info4) ans=input(prompt) #5.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。 if ans=="TREE": #使用者若輸入 "TREE" ，顯示下列文字後進行第6步 print(tree_info5) ans=input(prompt) #6.提示文字 ":: "，接受使用者指令。 if ans == "YES": #使用者若輸入 "YES" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式 print(yes_info6) elif ans=="NO": #若輸入 "NO" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式 print(no_info6) else: #否則顯示下列文字並離開程式 print(else_info) else: #否則顯示下列文字並離開程式 print(else_info) elif ans=="NO":#若輸入 "NO" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式 print(no_info4) else: #否則顯示下列文字並離開程式 print(else_info) else:#否則顯示下列文字並離開程式 print(else_info) elif ans=="RIGHT": #若輸入 "RIGHT" ，顯示下列文字後離開程式 print(right_info2) else: #否則顯示下列文字並離開程式 print(else_info) else: #否則顯示下列文字並離開程式 print(else_info)

stdin.text: LOOK LEFT CRAB YES TREE NO

expected.text: You are on a deserted island in a 2D world. Try to survive until rescue arrives! Available commands are in CAPITAL letters. Any other command exits the program First LOOK around... :: LOOK You are stuck in a sand ditch. Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT. :: LEFT You see a STARFISH and a CRAB on the sand. And you're hungry! Which do you eat? :: CRAB Raw crab should be fine, right? YES or NO. :: YES Ok, You eat it raw. Fingers crossed. Food in your belly helps you see a TREE. :: TREE It's a coconut tree! And you're thirsty! Do you drink the coconut water? YES or NO. :: NO Good choice. Look! It's a rescue plane! You made it! \o/

You are on a deserted island in a 2D world. Try to survive until rescue arrives! Available commands are in CAPITAL letters. Any other command exits the program First LOOK around... :: LOOK You are stuck in a sand ditch. Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT. :: LEFT You see a STARFISH and a CRAB on the sand. And you're hungry! Which do you eat? :: FISH You can only do actions shown in capital letters. Try again!

You are on a deserted island in a 2D world. Try to survive until rescue arrives! Available commands are in CAPITAL letters. Any other command exits the program First LOOK around... :: LOOK You are stuck in a sand ditch. Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT. :: RIGHT No can do. That side is very slippery. You fall very far into some weird cavern. You do not survive :(

stdin.text: LOOK LEFT CRAB YES TREE YES

expected.text: You are on a deserted island in a 2D world. Try to survive until rescue arrives! Available commands are in CAPITAL letters. Any other command exits the program First LOOK around... :: LOOK You are stuck in a sand ditch. Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT. :: LEFT You see a STARFISH and a CRAB on the sand. And you're hungry! Which do you eat? :: CRAB Raw crab should be fine, right? YES or NO. :: YES Ok, You eat it raw. Fingers crossed. Food in your belly helps you see a TREE. :: TREE It's a coconut tree! And you're thirsty! Do you drink the coconut water? YES or NO. :: YES Oh boy. Coconut water and rawcrab don't mix. You do not survive :(

You are on a deserted island in a 2D world. Try to survive until rescue arrives! Available commands are in CAPITAL letters. Any other command exits the program First LOOK around... :: LOOK You are stuck in a sand ditch. Crawl out LEFT or RIGHT. :: LEFT You see a STARFISH and a CRAB on the sand. And you're hungry! Which do you eat? :: CRAB Raw crab should be fine, right? YES or NO. :: YES Ok, You eat it raw. Fingers crossed. Food in your belly helps you see a TREE. :: THREE You can only do actions shown in capital letters. Try again!

questiontext.text:
請寫一段程式，出現提示字串 "Give me a string: " ，輸入一個小寫字母組成的字串，
若該字串包含所有母音字母(a,e,i,o,u)，則顯示 "You have all the vowels!"；
如果字串的開頭為 a ，且結尾為 z，則顯示 "And it's sort of alphabetical!"。
如： 輸入 "education"，顯示結果為 "You have all the vowels!"

expected.text: Give me a string: education You have all the vowels!
Give me a string: abuzz And it's sort of alphabetical!
Give me a string: authoritative You have all the vowels!
Give me a string: austerolitz You have all the vowels! And it's sort of alphabetical!

name.text: 輸入兩個整數判斷它們關係

questiontext.text:
請寫一段程式，分別出現提示字串 "First number is: " 及 "Second number is: "
取得兩個整數值，接著顯示出這兩個數字間的關係：
  • 兩數相等，顯示"Numbers are equal."
  • 第一個數小於第二個數，顯示"First number is less than the second number."
  • 第一個數大於第二個數，顯示"First number is greater than the second number."
如： 輸入 5 及 5，就顯示結果為 "Numbers are equal."

expected.text: First number is: 5 Second number is: 5 Numbers are equal.
First number is: 2 Second number is: 3 First number is less than the second number.
First number is: 6 Second number is: 5 First number is greater than the second number.
First number is: 0 Second number is: -1 First number is greater than the second number.
First number is: 12345678987654321 Second number is: 12345678987654321 Numbers are equal.
